##Exercise 1

a)
```{r}
library(osmdata)

alps_bbox <- getbb("Alps")
print(alps_bbox)

```
b)
```{r}
library(sf)
library(tmap)

alps_bbox_sf <- opq(bbox = alps_bbox) %>%
  add_osm_feature(key = 'natural', value = 'mountain_range') %>%
  osmdata_sf()

tm_shape(alps_bbox_sf$osm_multipolygons) +
  tm_borders(col = "darkgreen") +
  tmap_mode("view")  # For interactive version

tm_shape(alps_bbox_sf$osm_multipolygons) +
  tm_borders(col = "darkgreen") +
  tmap_mode("plot")  # For non-interactive version

```
